sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_b4730cd30f112200f80047ace1050efd
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.UsdkUtil</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>UsdkUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var UsdkUtil = Class.create();
UsdkUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	getCustomApps: function() {
		try {
			var customAppList = [];
			var grCustApps = new GlideRecord("u_ushur_applications");
			grCustApps.addQuery('u_status=define');
			grCustApps.addQuery('u_app_referenceISNOTEMPTY');
			grCustApps.orderBy('sys_created_on');
			grCustApps.query();
			
			while(grCustApps.next()) {
				customAppList.push({"name": grCustApps.getDisplayValue("u_name"),
				"scope" : grCustApps.getDisplayValue("u_scope"),
				"sysid" : grCustApps.getDisplayValue("sys_id")});
			}
			//gs.log(JSON.stringify(customAppList), "usdk");
			return JSON.stringify(customAppList);
			
		} catch(error) {
			gs.log('Error in Script Include : UsdkUtil : getCustomApps - ' + error);
		}
	},
	
	getSysAppDetails: function() {
		try {
			var sysAppList = {};
			var grSysApps = new GlideRecord('sys_app');
			grSysApps.addQuery('scope', this.getParameter('appScope'));
			grSysApps.query();
			
			while(grSysApps.next()) {
				sysAppList.sysid = grSysApps.getDisplayValue("sys_id");
			}
			//gs.log(JSON.stringify(sysAppList), "usdk");
			return JSON.stringify(sysAppList);
		} catch(error) {
			gs.log('Error in Script Include : UsdkUtil : getSysAppDetails - ' + error);
		}
	},
	getUshurAppDetails: function() {
		try {
			var sysAppList = {};
			var grSysApps = new GlideRecord('u_ushur_applications');
			grSysApps.addQuery('u_scope', this.getParameter('appScope'));
			grSysApps.query();
			
			while(grSysApps.next()) {
				sysAppList.sysID = grSysApps.getDisplayValue("sys_id");
			}
			//gs.log(JSON.stringify(sysAppList), "usdk");
			return JSON.stringify(sysAppList);
		} catch(error) {
			gs.log('Error in Script Include : UsdkUtil : getSysAppDetails - ' + error);
		}
	},
	
	verifyConnection : function () {
		
		var action = this.getParameter('sysparm_action');
		if(action == "create")
			new UshurSDKConnectionUtil().getLocalTokenID();
		
		var json_data = {};
		json_data["email_id"] = gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.email_id');
		json_data["password"] = gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.password');
		json_data["token_id"] = gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.tokenID');
		
		if(json_data["email_id"] && json_data["password"] && json_data["token_id"] )
			return JSON.stringify(json_data);
		else
			return "false";
	},
	
	getExplorerLinks : function () {
		var json_ary = [], url = '', menu_type = '';
		var appScope = this.getParameter('appScope');
		if(appScope) {
			var grLinks = new GlideRecord('u_usdk_application_explorer');
			grLinks.addQuery('u_active', true);
			grLinks.orderBy('u_order');
			grLinks.query();
			
			while(grLinks.next()) {
				
				menu_type  = grLinks.getValue('u_menu_type');
				
				if(menu_type == '1') {
					url = "javascript:void(0);";
				}
				else {
					url = grLinks.getValue('u_url');
					if(url == '' || url == '#')
						url = "javascript:void(0);";
					else
						url = '../'+url.replace("$scope",appScope);
				}
				json_ary.push({"name": grLinks.getValue('u_feature_name'),
				"url" : url,
				"menu_type" : menu_type});
			}
			if( json_ary.length >0 )
				return JSON.stringify(json_ary);
			else
				return "false";
		}
		else
			return "false";
	},
	type: 'UsdkUtil'

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_631dbc050f31b600981bc3ace1050e08
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.UshurSDKConnectionUtil</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>UshurSDKConnectionUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var UshurSDKConnectionUtil = Class.create();
UshurSDKConnectionUtil.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
		this.retryAttemptsRemaining = 2; //Number of times ServiceNow will try to connect with Ushur in case of a failure
		
		//Read the properties
		this.signUpURL = 'https://' + gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.target.ushur.host') + '/' + gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.signupurl');
		this.loginURL = 'https://' + gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.target.ushur.host') + '/' + gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.loginurl');
		this.getUshurIDURL = 'https://' + gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.target.ushur.host') + '/' + gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.getushuridurl');
		this.initSessURL = 'https://' + gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.target.ushur.host') + '/' + gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.initsessurl');
		this.appointmentQueryURL = 'https://' + gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.target.ushur.host') + '/' + gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.appointmentqueryurl');
		this.callBackNum = gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.callbacknum');
		this.usnid = gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.usnid');
		this.nRecords= gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.max.count.json');
	},
	getConnectionSetting: function(name){
		//DESCRIPTION - This function will retrieve settings from the table Ushur Connection Variables
		
		/*PARAMETERS-
		name(string): The name of the setting that needs to be retrieved
 		*/
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		value(string): The value of the setting as a string. In case of failure return boolean false
 		*/
		var value;
		try{
			var setting=new GlideRecord(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '_connection_variables');
			if(setting.get('name',name)){
				//var value = setting.getValue('value');
				value = setting.encrypted_value.getDecryptedValue().toString();
				
				//If this is a password, decode it
				if(name.indexOf('password')>=0){
					value = gs.base64Decode(value);
				}
			}
			else{
				throw "[USHUR] ERROR: Setting " + name + " was not found.";
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			value = false;
		}
		return value;
	},
	setConnectionSetting: function(name, value){
		//DESCRIPTION - This function will set settings in the table Ushur Connection Settings[ushur_connection_settings]
		
		/*PARAMETERS-
		name(string): The name of the setting that needs to be set
		value(string): The value of the setting
 		*/
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		status(boolean): if operation was successful return true, else false
 		*/
		
		var status = true;
		try{
			value = value.toString();  //To make sure that the value is of String type
			if(value){
				//If the value is a password, encode it
				if(name.indexOf('password')>=0){
					value = gs.base64Encode(value);
				}
				else{
					gs.setProperty(name, value);
					/*setting.initialize();
					setting.setValue('name',name);
					setting.setValue('encrypted_value',value);
					if(!setting.insert()){
						throw "[USHUR] Error: Could not insert connection variable.";
					}*/
				}
			}
			else{
				throw "[USHUR] Error: Invalid value passed to function setConnectionSetting.";
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			status = false;
		}
		return status;
	},
	
	getJSONRequest : function (content) {
		//DESCRIPTION - This function will create a request in the form of a JSON message
		
		/*PARAMETERS-
		content(array): An array of name-value pairs (like [['name1','value1'],['name2','value2']]) that will be part of the JSON request
 		*/
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		JSONRequest(JSON message / NULL): The JSON message. Return NULL in case of failure
 		*/
		
		var JSONRequest;
		try{
			//Create a new object containing the name value pairs passed in the content array
			var contentObject = {};
			for(var row = 0 ; row < content.length ; row++){
				//There is no need for another for loop, as we know each row has 2 items
				if((gs.nil(content[row][0])) || (gs.nil(content[row][1]))){
					gs.error('[USHUR] WARNING: function getJSONRequest() - Content undefined at index ' + row);
				}
				else{
					contentObject[content[row][0].toString()] = content[row][1].toString();
				}
			}
			
			//Convert the new object to JSON format
			var encoder = new global.JSON();
			JSONRequest = encoder.encode(contentObject);
			if(!JSONRequest){
				throw '[USHUR] Error: Could not create JSON request body.';
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			JSONRequest = null;
		}
		return JSONRequest;
	},
	callUshur: function(method, endPoint, requestBody){
		//DESCRIPTION - This function will create a REST message and use it to connect with Ushur.
		
		/*PARAMETERS-
		method(string): The HTTP method to be used for this call - GET or POST
		endPoint(string): The Ushur URL to which ServiceNow will connect
		requestBody(JSON): In Case of POST requests, the content of the REST request will be a JSON object.
 		*/
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		output(array): It will return 2 elements based on the response [HTTP Status / NULL, Parsed response object / NULL]
 		*/
		
		var connection;  //Values can be 'ready', 'successful', 'failure'
		var request;
		var response;
		var responseBody;
		var httpStatus;
		var output=[];
		
		try{
			//Send the request and store the response
			try {
				request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
				request.setHttpMethod(method);
				request.setEndpoint(endPoint);
				if(!gs.nil(this.usnid)){
					request.setRequestHeader('Priv-Ushur-Referer',gs.getProperty('instance_name')+'.service-now.com;usnid='+ this.usnid);
					
				}
				else{
					request.setRequestHeader('Priv-Ushur-Referer',gs.getProperty('instance_name')+'.service-now.com');
					
				}
				if((requestBody)&&(method == 'post')){
					//This will be a JSON object. It will be added only for call using POST method
					request.setRequestBody(requestBody);
				}
				connection = 'ready';
				response = request.executeAsync();
				connection = 'successful';
			}
			catch(err) {
				connection = 'failure';
				httpStatus = null;
				output.push(httpStatus);                 //httpStatus is the first element in the returned array
				throw "[USHUR] Error: Unable to connect with Ushur. Description: " + err.getMessage();
			}
			
			//If connection was successful, get the response body
			if(connection == 'successful'){
				httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();   //Get the status
				output.push(httpStatus);                 //httpStatus is the first element in the returned array
				if(response.haveError()){
					throw "[USHUR] Error: " +  response.getErrorMessage();
				}
				else{
					responseBody = response.getBody();
					
					if(responseBody.indexOf('null({') >= 0){
						//This is a special case for getting token ID.
						responseBody = responseBody.substring(responseBody.indexOf('{'),responseBody.indexOf('}'));
					}
					
					var parser = new global.JSON();
					var parsedResponse = parser.decode(responseBody);
					
					//In case response was not a JSON, set parsed response same as response
					if((responseBody.toString() != '') && !parsedResponse){
						parsedResponse = responseBody;
					}
					
					//If response could not be obained, retry
					if((httpStatus != 200)&&(this.retryAttemptsRemaining>0)){
						//In case of failure, try to generate token ID
						//Number of attempts should be less than or equal to the pre-defined retry attempt count
						this.retryAttemptsRemaining--; //Reduce remaining attempt count
						
						var newOutput = this.callUshur(method, endPoint, requestBody); //The output is in the form of an array like [HTTP Status / NULL, Parsed response object / NULL]
						httpStatus = newOutput[0];
						parsedResponse = newOutput[1];
					}
					if(httpStatus == 200){
						output.push(parsedResponse); //The parsed object is the second element in the returned array
					}
					else{
						if(httpStatus != 200){
							throw "[USHUR] Error: HTTP Status is " + httpStatus +". Expected status to be 200.";
						}
						else{
							throw "[USHUR] Error: Unable to parse the response from Ushur.";
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			output.push(null); //Since there was an error while parsing, the second element is set to null
		}
		return output;
	},
	createUshurAccount: function() {
		//DESCRIPTION - This function will create an account for the this ServiceNow instance in Ushur. Only one Account can be created per instance.
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		logInDetails(array): The login details returned by Ushur, that will be used in future connections. Format is [email,password]
 		*/
		var logInDetails=[];
		var currentInstance = gs.getProperty('instance_name');
		//this.setConnectionSetting('ushur.connect.account',currentInstance); //Store the accountName
		gs.setProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.account', currentInstance);
		//SignUp into Ushur using the web service
		try{
			//var signUpEndPoint = this.signUpURL + currentInstance;
			var signUpEndPoint = this.signUpURL  +currentInstance;
			var response = this.callUshur('get', signUpEndPoint); //Response is an array like [HTTP Status / NULL, Parsed response object / NULL]
			
			//Read the response
			var httpStatus = response[0];
			if (httpStatus == 200){
				var ushurResponse = response[1];
				
				if(ushurResponse){
					gs.setProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.email_id', ushurResponse.emailId);
					gs.setProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.password', ushurResponse.password);
					// this.setConnectionSetting('ushur.connect.email',ushurResponse.emailId); //Store the Email ID for future use
					//this.setConnectionSetting('ushur.connect.password',ushurResponse.password); //Store the Password for future use
					
					logInDetails.push(ushurResponse.emailId); //If Signup was successful, return the email ID that will be used in  future connections
					logInDetails.push(ushurResponse.password); //If Signup was successful, return the password that will be used in  future connections
				}
			}
			else if (httpStatus == 409){
				throw "[Ushur] Error: Client " + currentInstance + " already exists in Ushur.";
			}
			else{
				throw "[Ushur] Error: Failed to create account in Ushur.";
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			logInDetails.push(null); //Email = NULL
			logInDetails.push(null); //Password = NULL
		}
		return logInDetails;
	},
	
	getTokenID : function() {
		//DESCRIPTION - This function retrieves a token ID from Ushur which is needed to get the Ushur ID
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		tokenID(string): The Token ID returned by Ushur, that will be used in future connections
 		*/
		
		var tokenID = '';
		//Get the prerequisites for Token ID - Email and Password
		var email = gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.email_id');
		var password = gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.password');
		
		//If any details is missing, re-connect with Ushur
		if((!email)||(!password)||(email == '')||(password == '')){
			var logInDetails = this.createUshurAccount();  //Format is [email,password]
			email = logInDetails[0];
			password = logInDetails[1];
		}
		
		try{
			if((email)&&(password)){
				//Login to Usher using web service, to get the Token ID. Prerequisites - Email ID and Password recieved during Signup to Ushur
				var loginEndPoint = this.loginURL;
				
				var JSONContent = this.getJSONRequest([["email",email],["password",password],["apiVer","2.1"]]);
				var response = this.callUshur('post',loginEndPoint,JSONContent); //Response is an array like [HTTP Status, Parsed response object /  "failure" Message]
				
				//Read the response
				var httpStatus = response[0];
				if (httpStatus == 200){
					var ushurResponse = response[1];
					
					if(ushurResponse){
						gs.setProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.tokenID', ushurResponse.tokenId);
						//this.setConnectionSetting('ushur.connect.tokenID',ushurResponse.tokenId); //Store the Token ID for future connections to Ushur
						tokenID = ushurResponse.tokenId;
					}
				}
				else{
					throw "[Ushur] Error: Failed to generate Token ID for this ServiceNow instance.";
				}
			}
			else{
				throw "[Ushur] Error: Missing pre-requisites(A valid Email and Password combination) for generating the Token ID.";
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			tokenID = null;
		}
		return tokenID;
	},
	
	getUshurID: function(){
		//DESCRIPTION - This function will connect ServiceNow to Ushur and obtain the Ushur ID
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		UshurID(string): The Ushur ID returned by Ushur, that will be used in future connections
 		*/
		
		var ushurID = '';
		//Get the prerequisites for Usur ID - Token ID and Email
		var tokenID = gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.tokenID');   //Ushur provides a token ID which is stored in a property for future use
		var email = gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.email_id');
		
		if((!tokenID)||(tokenID == '')||(!email)||(email == '')){
			tokenID = this.getLocalTokenID(); //Request a new Token ID from Ushur if no token ID is found in ServiceNow
		}
		
		try{
			if((tokenID)&&(email)){
				//Connect with Usher using web service, to get the Ushur ID. Prerequisites - Token ID and Email ID
				//var ushurIDEndPoint = this.getUshurIDURL + tokenID + '/' + email;
				var ushurIDEndPoint = this.getUshurIDURL + tokenID;
				var response = this.callUshur('get',ushurIDEndPoint); //Response is an array like [HTTP Status, Parsed response object /  "failure" Message]
				
				//Read the response
				var httpStatus = response[0];
				if (httpStatus == 200){
					var ushurResponse = response[1];
					
					if(ushurResponse){
						gs.setProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.usnid', ushurResponse.ushurId);
						ushurID = ushurResponse.ushurId;
					}
				}
				else{
					throw "[Ushur] Error: Failed to generate Ushur ID for this ServiceNow instance.";
				}
			}
			else{
				throw '[Ushur] Error: Missing pre-requisites(A valid Email and Token ID) for generating the Ushur ID.';
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			ushurID = null;
		}
		return ushurID;
	},
	
	getLocalTokenID: function() {

		//var localTokenID= this.getConnectionSetting('ushur.connect.tokenID');
		var localTokenID= gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.tokenID');
		if ((!localTokenID) || (localTokenID == '')){
			localTokenID = this.getTokenID();
		}
		return localTokenID;
	},
	
	getLocalUshurID: function() {
		var localUshurID= gs.getProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.usnid');
		//var localUshurID=this.getConnectionSetting('ushur.connect.ushurID');
		if ((!localUshurID) || (localUshurID == '')){
			localUshurID = this.getUshurID();
		}
		return localUshurID;
	},
	type: 'UshurSDKConnectionUtil'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>dev.snow1@ushur.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-27 12:55:26</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>631dbc050f31b600981bc3ace1050e08</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UshurSDKConnectionUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_631dbc050f31b600981bc3ace1050e08</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>dev.snow1@ushur.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-05-23 15:59:41</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

Welcome to$[SP]Ushur

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_ec75f5de0fbc6200981bc3ace1050e81
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.UshurSDKUtil</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>UshurSDKUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var UshurSDKUtil = Class.create();
UshurSDKUtil.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},
	createApplication: function(newAppName,newAppScope,newAppDesc){
		
		var newAppSysID;
		var app = new GlideRecord('sys_app');
		try{
			if(!app.get('scope',newAppScope)){
				var newApp = new GlideRecord('sys_app');
				newApp.initialize();
				newApp.name = newAppName;
				newApp.scope = newAppScope;
				newApp.short_description = newAppDesc;
				
				newAppSysID = newApp.insert();
				this.updateAppCreationStatus(newAppScope,"Created ServiceNow Application \'" + newAppName + "\'");
			}
			else{
				//An application with the same scope already exists
				throw '[USHUR SDK]ERROR: Could not create the application ' + newAppName + '. An application with the scope ' + newAppScope + ' already exists.';
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			this.updateAppCreationStatus(newAppScope,err);
			newAppSysID = false;
		}
		return newAppSysID;
	},
	unloadIntegrationUser: function(){
		var status;
		try{
			var user = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
			if(user.get(this.getIntegrationUserID())){
				GlideappHome.unloader(user);
				status = true;
			}
			else{
				throw 'Could not find the user \'Ushur Integration\'';
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error('[USHUR SDK]ERROR: Could not unload the user \'Ushur Integration\' into the application update set. ' + err);
			status = false;
		}
		return status;
	},
	updateAppCreationStatus_old: function(appScope,status){
		try{
			var ushurApp = new GlideRecord('u_ushur_applications');
			ushurApp.addQuery('u_scope=' + appScope);
			ushurApp.query();
			if(ushurApp.next()){
				ushurApp.u_log = status;
				ushurApp.update();
			}
			else{
				throw "[USHUR SDK]ERROR: Could not find an application with scope " + appScope + " in the Ushur Applications table.";
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
		}
	},
	updateAppCreationStatus: function(appScope,status){
		try{
			var ushurApp = new GlideRecord('u_ushur_applications');
			if(ushurApp.get('u_scope',appScope)){
				//Insert new LOG in the 'Ushur App Log' table
				var appLog = new GlideRecord('u_ushur_app_log');
				appLog.initialize();
				appLog.u_message = status;
				appLog.u_ushur_application = ushurApp.sys_id;
				appLog.insert();
			}
			else{
				throw "[USHUR SDK]ERROR: Could not find an application with scope " + appScope + " in the Ushur Applications table.";
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
		}
	},
	getIntegrationUserID: function(){
		var userID;
		try{
			var user = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
			if(!user.get('user_name','ushur.integration.driver')){
				user = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
				user.initialize();
				user.applyTemplate('user.ushur.integration.driver');
				userID = user.insert();
			}
			else{
				userID = user.sys_id;
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error('[USHUR SDK]ERROR: Could not create the user \'Ushur Integration\'. ' + err);
			userID = false;
		}
		return userID;
	},
	generateName: function(appScope,component){
		var name;
		try{
			//Generate the name of the component
			var nameStructure = new GlideRecord('u_component_naming_structure');
			if(!nameStructure.get('u_component_type',component.u_component_type)){
				if(!nameStructure.get('u_component_type','')){
					throw '[USHUR SDK]ERROR: Could not generate name of the component as structure is unclear.';
				}
			}
			name = (new GlideScopedEvaluator()).evaluateScript(nameStructure,'u_name_structure',{'appScope':appScope, 'component':component});
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			this.updateAppCreationStatus(appScope,err);
			name = false;
		}
		return name;
	},
	getNameField: function(componentType){
		var nameField = 'name';
		var nameStructure = new GlideRecord('u_component_naming_structure');
		if(nameStructure.get('u_component_type',componentType)){
			nameField = nameStructure.u_name_field.toString();
		}
		return nameField;
	},
	getTableLabel: function(tableName){
		var table = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
		if(table.get('name',tableName)){
			return table.label;
		}
		else{
			return false;
		}
	},
	createApplicationData: function(appScope, appID){
		var status = true;
		var data = new GlideRecord('u_application_data');
		data.addQuery('u_active',true);
		data.orderBy('u_order');
		data.query(); //Get all the application data to be created
		try{
			while(data.next()){
				//Get the name of the target table
				var targetTable = this.getRecordFromComponent(appScope,appID,data.u_target_table.toString());
				if(targetTable){
					//Create new record in the target table
					var appData = new GlideRecord(targetTable.name.toString());
					appData.initialize();
					
					//Fill values in the target table
					var dataValues = new GlideRecord('u_application_data_values');
					dataValues.addQuery('u_application_data', data.sys_id.toString());
					dataValues.query();
					while(dataValues.next()){
						var value = dataValues.u_value.toString();
						if(dataValues.u_run_script){
							value = (new GlideScopedEvaluator()).evaluateScript(dataValues,'u_script',{'appScope':appScope, 'current':appData});
						}
						gs.info(dataValues.u_field_name.toString() + " = " + value.toString());
						//Set value
						appData.setValue(dataValues.u_field_name.toString(),value.toString());
					}
					
					//Insert the new record
					appData.insert();
					
					//Add as metadata to the application
					this.addMetaData(appData, 'Install');
				}
				else{
					throw 'Could not find the table ' + data.u_target_table.u_name + ' in the application.';
				}
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			this.updateAppCreationStatus(appScope,err);
			status = false;
		}
		return status;
	},
	createComponents: function(appScope,appID){
		var status = true;
		var componentType = '';
		var previousComponentType = componentType;
		var component = new GlideRecord('u_application_component');
		component.addQuery('u_active',true);
		component.orderBy('u_order');
		component.query(); //Get all the components to be created
		try{
			while(component.next()){
				componentType = component.u_component_type.toString();
				var item = new GlideRecord(componentType);
				item.initialize();
				item.sys_scope = appID; //To make sure that new component is created as part of the application
				
				item.setValue(this.getNameField(component.u_component_type),this.generateName(appScope,component));
				item.applyTemplate(component.u_template.name); //All other details except name is configured in templates
				if(!component.getElement('u_condition').nil()){
					//Additional filter conditions
					item.setValue(component.u_filter_field,component.u_condition);
				}
				//Add dependencies
				var dependentFieldValues = this.getComponentDependencies(appScope,appID,component);
				if((dependentFieldValues) && (dependentFieldValues.length > 0)){
					for(var index = 0; index<dependentFieldValues.length; index++){
						item.setValue(dependentFieldValues[index][0],dependentFieldValues[index][1]);
					}
				}
				item.setWorkflow(component.u_run_br); //BR should run as defined in component
				if((item.getElement(this.getNameField(component.u_component_type)).nil())||(!item.insert())){
					gs.error('[USHUR SDK]ERROR: Could not create the component ' + component.u_name + ' for application scope ' + appScope);
					status = false;
				}
				else{
					this.updateAppCreationStatus(appScope,"Created " + this.getTableLabel(component.u_component_type.toString()) + " \'" + item.getValue(this.getNameField(component.u_component_type)) + "\'");
				}
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			this.updateAppCreationStatus(appScope,err);
			status = false;
		}
		return status;
	},
	getComponentDependencies: function(appScope,appID,component){
		var dependentFieldValues=[];
		var dependency = new GlideRecord('u_component_dependency');
		dependency.addQuery('u_active',true);
		dependency.addQuery('u_dependent_component',component.sys_id);
		dependency.query();
		try{
			var name;
			var value;
			while(dependency.next()){
				name = dependency.u_dependent_field.toString();
				if(dependency.u_type == 'component'){
					var dependentOn = this.getRecordFromComponent(appScope,appID,dependency.u_dependent_on);
					value = dependentOn.getValue(dependency.u_read_value_from.toString());
				}
				else if(dependency.u_type == 'script'){
					value = (new GlideScopedEvaluator()).evaluateScript(dependency,'u_script',{'appScope':appScope, 'component':component});
				}
				else{}
					dependentFieldValues.push([name,value]);
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			this.updateAppCreationStatus(appScope,err);
			dependentFieldValues = false;
		}
		return dependentFieldValues;
	},
	addDependencies_old: function(appScope,appID){
		var status = true;
		var dependency = new GlideRecord('u_component_dependency');
		dependency.addQuery('u_active',true);
		dependency.query();
		try{
			while(dependency.next()){
				var dependentRecord = this.getRecordFromComponent(appScope,appID,dependency.u_dependent_component);
				var dependentOn = this.getRecordFromComponent(appScope,appID,dependency.u_dependent_on);
				if(!this.updateRecord(dependentRecord.getTableName(),dependentRecord.sys_id,dependency.u_dependent_field,dependentOn.getValue(dependency.u_read_value_from))){
					gs.error('[USHUR SDK]ERROR: Failed to update dependency in ' + dependentRecord.name);
					status = false;
				}
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			status = false;
		}
		return status;
	},
	updateRecord: function(table, sysID, fieldName, value){
		//Need to re-create the object of the dependent record, to avoid making duplicates of dependent record
		var recordUpdated;
		try{
			var record = new GlideRecord(table);
			if(record.get('sys_id',sysID)){
				record.setValue(fieldName,value);
				if(!record.update()){
					throw '[USHUR SDK]ERROR';
				}
			}
			else{
				throw '[USHUR SDK]ERROR';
			}
			recordUpdated = true;
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err + ': Could not update the record having sys_id ' + sysID + ' in table ' + table);
			this.updateAppCreationStatus(appScope,err + ': Could not update the record having sys_id ' + sysID + ' in table ' + table);
			recordUpdated = false;
		}
		return recordUpdated;
	},
	getRecordFromComponent: function(appScope,appID,componentSysID){
		var output;
		try{
			var component = new GlideRecord('u_application_component');
			if(component.get(componentSysID)){
				var recordName = this.generateName(appScope,component);
				if(!recordName){
					throw '[USHUR SDK]ERROR: Could not generate name for the component having sys_id ' + componentSysID;
				}
				else{
					var record = new GlideRecord(component.u_component_type);
					record.addQuery(this.getNameField(component.u_component_type),recordName);
					if(!component.getElement('u_search_query').nil()){
						record.addQuery(component.u_search_query);
					}
					record.addQuery('sys_scope', appID);
					record.query();
					while(record.next()){
						output = record;
					}
				}
			}
			else{
				throw '[USHUR SDK]ERROR: Could not find the component having sys_id ' + componentSysID;
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			this.updateAppCreationStatus(appScope,err);
			output = false;
		}
		return output;
	},
	metadataAlreadyExists: function(gr,appScope,type) {
		var dir;
		if(type == 'Install'){
			dir = "update";
		}
		else if(type == 'Demo'){
			dir = "unload.demo";
		}
		var output = new GlideRecord('sys_metadata_link');
		output.addQuery('documentkey=' + gr.sys_id + '^sys_scope=' + appScope + '^directory=' + dir + '^tablename=' + gr.getTableName());
		output.query();// Searches for current record in metadata table, outputs false if it doesn't exist
		if(output.next()) {
			// Checking if the record already exists in the metadata link table
			return true;
		}
		return false;
	},
	
	addMetaData: function(linkedRecord, type) {
		var payloadStr = gs.unloadRecordToXML(linkedRecord, true);
		var output = new GlideRecord('sys_metadata_link');
		output.initialize();
		output.payload = payloadStr;
		output.documentkey = linkedRecord.sys_id;
		output.tablename = linkedRecord.getTableName();
		output.sys_name = linkedRecord.getDisplayValue();
		if(type == 'Install'){
			output.directory = "update";
		}
		else if(type == 'Demo'){
			output.directory = "unload.demo";
		}
		output.insert();
	},
	
	overwriteMetadata: function(linkedRecord,appScope,type) {
		var dir;
		if(type == 'Install'){
			dir = "update";
		}
		else if(type == 'Demo'){
			dir = "unload.demo";
		}
		var payloadStr = gs.unloadRecordToXML(linkedRecord, true);
		var output = new GlideRecord('sys_metadata_link');
		output.addQuery('documentkey', linkedRecord.sys_id);
		output.addQuery('sys_scope', appScope);
		output.addQuery('tablename', linkedRecord.getTableName());
		output.addQuery('directory', dir);
		output.query();
		if (output.next()) {
			output.payload = payloadStr;
			output.sys_name = linkedRecord.getDisplayValue();
			return output.update();
		}
		return null;
	},
	createFormAnnotations: function(appScope, appID){
		var status = true;
		var annotations = new GlideRecord('u_form_annotations');
		annotations.addQuery('u_active',true);
		annotations.query();
		try{
			while(annotations.next()){
				//Get the Form section[sys_ui_section] related to the target table
				var formSection = false;
				
				var formSectionComponent = new GlideRecord('u_application_component');
				formSectionComponent.addQuery('u_component_type=sys_ui_section^u_related_component=' + annotations.u_visible_on_table + '^u_active=true');
					formSectionComponent.query();
					if(formSectionComponent.next()){
					formSection = this.getRecordFromComponent(appScope,appID,formSectionComponent.sys_id.toString());
					}
				
				if(formSection){
					var sys_ui_annotation = new GlideRecord('sys_ui_annotation');
					sys_ui_annotation.initialize();
					sys_ui_annotation.text = annotations.u_text;
					sys_ui_annotation.type = annotations.u_type;
					sys_ui_annotation.is_plain_text = annotations.u_is_plain_text;
					
					var annotationID = sys_ui_annotation.insert();
					if(annotationID){
						var sys_ui_element = new GlideRecord('sys_ui_element');
						sys_ui_element.initialize();
						sys_ui_element.element = annotationID;
						sys_ui_element.position = annotations.u_position;
						sys_ui_element.type = 'annotation';
						sys_ui_element.sys_ui_section = formSection.sys_id;
						sys_ui_element.insert();
					}
					else{
						gs.error('Could not create annotation with text ' + annotations.u_text);
					}
				}
				else{
					gs.error('Could not find form section for table ' + annotations.u_visible_on_table.u_name);
				}
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			this.updateAppCreationStatus(appScope,err);
			status = false;
		}
		return status;
	},
	type: 'UshurSDKUtil'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>dev.snow1@ushur.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-07-26 00:59:10</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>ec75f5de0fbc6200981bc3ace1050e81</sys_id><sys_mod_count>75</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UshurSDKUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ec75f5de0fbc6200981bc3ace1050e81</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>dev.snow1@ushur.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-27 10:26:46</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>Clear Token ID after it expires</name><run_as display_value="Dev Snow1">53d925b20fd31200981bc3ace1050ec0</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period>1970-01-01 00:15:00</run_period><run_start>2017-05-23 13:55:20</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_type>periodically</run_type><script><![CDATA[function clearTokenID(){
	gs.setProperty('ushur.sdk.connect.tokenID','');
}
clearTokenID();]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>dev.snow1@ushur.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-05-23 15:47:18</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>60ed22530ff63e00981bc3ace1050e97</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Clear Token ID after it expires</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_60ed22530ff63e00981bc3ace1050e97</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>dev.snow1@ushur.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-05-23 15:52:27</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>
