sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_c5dbdeba0f5d6a00981bc3ace1050e0e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.UshurUtilSample</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>This a sample UshurUtil script that will be copied to the UshurUtil script include for each application by the Ushur SDK</description><name>UshurUtilSample</name><script><![CDATA[var UshurUtil = Class.create();
UshurUtil.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	//	this.retryAttemptsRemaining = 2; //Number of times ServiceNow will try to connect with Ushur in case of a failure
		
		//Read the properties
		this.signUpURL = gs.getProperty(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '.connect.signupurl');
		this.loginURL = gs.getProperty(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '.connect.loginurl');
		this.getUshurIDURL = gs.getProperty(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '.connect.getushuridurl');
		this.initSessURL = gs.getProperty(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '.connect.initsessurl');
		this.appointmentQueryURL = gs.getProperty(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '.connect.appointmentqueryurl');
		this.callBackNum = gs.getProperty(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '.connect.callbacknum');
		this.usnid= gs.getProperty(gs.getCurrentScopeName()+ '.connect.usnid');
		this.nRecords= gs.getProperty(gs.getCurrentScopeName()+ '.connect.max.count.json');
	},
	getConnectionSetting: function(name){
		//DESCRIPTION - This function will retrieve settings from the table Ushur Connection Variables
		
		/*PARAMETERS-
		name(string): The name of the setting that needs to be retrieved
 		*/
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		value(string): The value of the setting as a string. In case of failure return boolean false
 		*/
		var value;
		try{
			var setting=new GlideRecord(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '_connection_variables');
			if(setting.get('name',name)){
				//var value = setting.getValue('value');
				value = setting.encrypted_value.getDecryptedValue().toString();
				
				//If this is a password, decode it
				if(name.indexOf('password')>=0){
					value = gs.base64Decode(value);
				}
			}
			else{
				throw "[USHUR] ERROR: Setting " + name + " was not found.";
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			value = false;
		}
		return value;
	},
	setConnectionSetting: function(name, value){
		//DESCRIPTION - This function will set settings in the table Ushur Connection Settings[ushur_connection_settings]
		
		/*PARAMETERS-
		name(string): The name of the setting that needs to be set
		value(string): The value of the setting
 		*/
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		status(boolean): if operation was successful return true, else false
 		*/
		
		var status = true;
		try{
			value = value.toString();  //To make sure that the value is of String type
			if(value){
				//If the value is a password, encode it
				if(name.indexOf('password')>=0){
					value = gs.base64Encode(value);
				}
				
				var setting=new GlideRecord(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '_connection_variables');
				//Check if a record of this setting alread exists, else create new setting record
				if(setting.get('name',name)){
					setting.setValue('encrypted_value',value);
					if(!setting.update()){
						throw "[USHUR] Error: Could not update connection variable.";
					}
					
				}
				else{
					setting.initialize();
					setting.setValue('name',name);
					setting.setValue('encrypted_value',value);
					if(!setting.insert()){
						throw "[USHUR] Error: Could not insert connection variable.";
					}
				}
			}
			else{
				throw "[USHUR] Error: Invalid value passed to function setConnectionSetting.";
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			status = false;
		}
		return status;
	},
	
	callUshur: function(method, endPoint, requestBody){
		//DESCRIPTION - This function will create a REST message and use it to connect with Ushur.
		
		/*PARAMETERS-
		method(string): The HTTP method to be used for this call - GET or POST
		endPoint(string): The Ushur URL to which ServiceNow will connect
		requestBody(JSON): In Case of POST requests, the content of the REST request will be a JSON object.
 		*/
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		output(array): It will return 2 elements based on the response [HTTP Status / NULL, Parsed response object / NULL]
 		*/
		
		var connection;  //Values can be 'ready', 'successful', 'failure'
		var request;
		var response;
		var responseBody;
		var httpStatus;
		var output=[];
		try{
			//Send the request and store the response
			try {
				request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
				request.setHttpMethod(method);
				request.setEndpoint(endPoint);
				if(!gs.nil(this.usnid)){
					request.setRequestHeader('Priv-Ushur-Referer',gs.getProperty('instance_name')+'.service-now.com;usnid='+ this.usnid);
					
				}
				else{
					request.setRequestHeader('Priv-Ushur-Referer',gs.getProperty('instance_name')+'.service-now.com');
					
				}
				if((requestBody)&&(method == 'post')){
					//This will be a JSON object. It will be added only for call using POST method
					request.setRequestBody(requestBody);
				}
				connection = 'ready';
				response = request.executeAsync();
				connection = 'successful';
			}
			catch(err) {
				connection = 'failure';
				httpStatus = null;
				output.push(httpStatus);                 //httpStatus is the first element in the returned array
				throw "[USHUR] Error: Unable to connect with Ushur. Description: " + err.getMessage();
			}
			//If connection was successful, get the response body
			if(connection == 'successful'){
				httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();   //Get the status
				output.push(httpStatus);                 //httpStatus is the first element in the returned array
					var parsedResponse;
					if (httpStatus == 200){
						responseBody = response.getBody();
						//gs.info("in callUshur : " + endPoint + " : " + responseBody);
						if(responseBody.indexOf('null({') >= 0){
							//This is a special case for getting token ID.
							responseBody = responseBody.substring(responseBody.indexOf('{'),responseBody.indexOf('}'));
						}
						parsedResponse = new global.JSON().decode(responseBody);
						//In case response was not a JSON, set parsed response same as response
						if((responseBody.toString() != '') && !parsedResponse){
							parsedResponse = responseBody;
						}
						if(parsedResponse.status == 'failure' || parsedResponse.success== 'false'){
							if((parsedResponse.respText && parsedResponse.respText.indexOf("Account not found") >= 0)
							   || (parsedResponse.infoText && parsedResponse.infoText.indexOf("You are not a valid user") >= 0)){
								this.retrieveCredentials(endPoint);
							}
							output.push('failure');
						}
						else{
							output.push(parsedResponse); //The parsed object is the second element in the returned array
						}
					}
					else if(httpStatus== 403){
						this.retrieveCredentials(endPoint);
						output.push('failure');
					}else{
						output.push("failure"); //In case of any error the second element will be a string called "failure"
					}
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			output.push("failure"); //Since there was an error while parsing, the second element is set to null
		}
		return output;
	},
	
	retrieveCredentials: function(endPoint){
		//gs.info("in retrieveCredentials");
		if(gs.nil(endPoint)){
			gs.info("in retrieveCredentials endPoint is empty " + endPoint);
			return false;
		}
		try{
			if(endPoint.indexOf('login') >= 0){
				var response = this.createUshurAccount();
				if(response[0] != "failure" && response[1]!="failure"){
					if(this.getTokenID() != "failure"){
						gs.info("in retrieveCredentials completed signup and getTokenID returning true " + endPoint);
						return true;
					}
				}
			}else if(endPoint.indexOf('signup') == -1){
				if(this.getTokenID() != "failure"){
					gs.info("in retrieveCredentials completed getTokenID returning true " + endPoint);
					return true;
				}
			}
		}catch(err){
			gs.info("in retrieveCredentials err " + err);
			return false;
		}
		return false;
	},
	
	
	createUshurAccount: function() {
		//DESCRIPTION - This function will create an account for the this ServiceNow instance in Ushur. Only one Account can be created per instance.
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		logInDetails(array): The login details returned by Ushur, that will be used in future connections. Format is [email,password]
 		*/
		var logInDetails=[];
		var currentInstance = gs.getProperty('instance_name');
		this.setConnectionSetting('ushur.connect.account',currentInstance); //Store the accountName
		
		//SignUp into Ushur using the web service
		try{
			var signUpEndPoint = this.signUpURL + currentInstance;
			var response = this.callUshur('get', signUpEndPoint); //Response is an array like [HTTP Status / NULL, Parsed response object / NULL]
			
			//Read the response
			var httpStatus = response[0];
			if (httpStatus == 200){
				var ushurResponse = response[1];
				
				if(ushurResponse && ushurResponse != "failure" && ushurResponse.status != "failure"){
					this.setConnectionSetting('ushur.connect.email',ushurResponse.emailId); //Store the Email ID for future use
					this.setConnectionSetting('ushur.connect.password',ushurResponse.password); //Store the Password for future use
					
					logInDetails.push(ushurResponse.emailId); //If Signup was successful, return the email ID that will be used in  future connections
					logInDetails.push(ushurResponse.password); //If Signup was successful, return the password that will be used in  future connections
				}
			}
			else if (httpStatus == 409){
				throw "[Ushur] Error: Client " + currentInstance + " already exists in Ushur.";
			}
			else{
				throw "[Ushur] Error: Failed to create account in Ushur.";
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			logInDetails.push('failure'); //Email = failure
			logInDetails.push('failure'); //Password = failure
		}
		return logInDetails;
	},
	
	getTokenID : function() {
		//DESCRIPTION - This function retrieves a token ID from Ushur which is needed to get the Ushur ID
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		tokenID(string): The Token ID returned by Ushur, that will be used in future connections
 		*/
		
		var tokenID = '';
		//Get the prerequisites for Token ID - Email and Password
		var email = this.getConnectionSetting('ushur.connect.email');
		var password = this.getConnectionSetting('ushur.connect.password');
		
		//If any details is missing, re-connect with Ushur
		if((!email)||(!password)||(email == '')||(password == '')){
			var logInDetails = this.createUshurAccount();  //Format is [email,password]
			email = logInDetails[0];
			password = logInDetails[1];
		}
		
		try{
			if((email)&&(password)){
				//Login to Usher using web service, to get the Token ID. Prerequisites - Email ID and Password recieved during Signup to Ushur
				var loginEndPoint = this.loginURL;
				
				var JSONContent = this.getJSONRequest([["email",email],["password",password],["apiVer","2.1"]]);
				var response = this.callUshur('post',loginEndPoint,JSONContent); //Response is an array like [HTTP Status, Parsed response object /  "failure" Message]
				
				//Read the response
				var httpStatus = response[0];
				if (httpStatus == 200){
					var ushurResponse = response[1];
					
					if(ushurResponse && ushurResponse != "failure" && ushurResponse.status != "failure"){
						this.setConnectionSetting('ushur.connect.tokenID',ushurResponse.tokenId); //Store the Token ID for future connections to Ushur
						tokenID = ushurResponse.tokenId;
					}
				}
				else{
					throw "[Ushur] Error: Failed to generate Token ID for this ServiceNow instance.";
				}
			}
			else{
				throw "[Ushur] Error: Missing pre-requisites(A valid Email and Password combination) for generating the Token ID.";
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			tokenID = "failure";
		}
		return tokenID;
	},
	
	getUshurID: function(){
		//DESCRIPTION - This function will connect ServiceNow to Ushur and obtain the Ushur ID
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		UshurID(string): The Ushur ID returned by Ushur, that will be used in future connections
 		*/
		
		var ushurID = '';
		//Get the prerequisites for Usur ID - Token ID and Email
		var tokenID = this.getConnectionSetting('ushur.connect.tokenID');  //Ushur provides a token ID which is stored in a property for future use
		//var email = this.getConnectionSetting('ushur.connect.email');
		
		if((!tokenID)||(tokenID == '')){
			tokenID = this.getLocalTokenID(); //Request a new Token ID from Ushur if no token ID is found in ServiceNow
		}
		
		try{
			if(tokenID){
				//Connect with Usher using web service, to get the Ushur ID. Prerequisites - Token ID and Email ID
				//var ushurIDEndPoint = this.getUshurIDURL + tokenID + '/' + email;
				var ushurIDEndPoint = this.getUshurIDURL + tokenID;
				var response = this.callUshur('get',ushurIDEndPoint); //Response is an array like [HTTP Status, Parsed response object /  "failure" Message]
				
				//Read the response
				var httpStatus = response[0];
				if (httpStatus == 200){
					var ushurResponse = response[1];
					
					if(ushurResponse && ushurResponse != "failure" && ushurResponse.status != "failure"){
						this.setConnectionSetting('ushur.connect.ushurID',ushurResponse.ushurId); //Store the Usher ID for future connections to Ushur
						ushurID = ushurResponse.ushurId;
					}
				}
				else{
					throw "[Ushur] Error: Failed to generate Ushur ID for this ServiceNow instance.";
				}
			}
			else{
				throw '[Ushur] Error: Missing pre-requisites(A valid Email and Token ID) for generating the Ushur ID.';
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			ushurID = 'failure';
		}
		return ushurID;
	},
	
	getLocalTokenID: function() {
		var localTokenID=this.getConnectionSetting('ushur.connect.tokenID');
		if ((!localTokenID) || (localTokenID == '')){
			localTokenID = this.getTokenID();
		}
		return localTokenID;
	},
	
	getLocalUshurID: function() {
		var localUshurID=this.getConnectionSetting('ushur.connect.ushurID');
		if ((!localUshurID) || (localUshurID == '')){
			localUshurID = this.getUshurID();
		}
		return localUshurID;
	},
	
	getJSONRequest : function (content) {
		//DESCRIPTION - This function will create a request in the form of a JSON message
		
		/*PARAMETERS-
		content(array): An array of name-value pairs (like [['name1','value1'],['name2','value2']]) that will be part of the JSON request
 		*/
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		JSONRequest(JSON message / NULL): The JSON message. Return NULL in case of failure
 		*/
		
		var JSONRequest;
		try{
			//Create a new object containing the name value pairs passed in the content array
			var contentObject = {};
			for(var row = 0 ; row < content.length ; row++){
				//There is no need for another for loop, as we know each row has 2 items
				if((gs.nil(content[row][0])) || (gs.nil(content[row][1]))){
					gs.error('[USHUR] WARNING: function getJSONRequest() - Content undefined at index ' + row + " : " + content[row][0]);
				}
				else{
					contentObject[content[row][0].toString()] = content[row][1].toString();
				}
			}
			
			//Convert the new object to JSON format
			var encoder = new global.JSON();
			JSONRequest = encoder.encode(contentObject);
			if(!JSONRequest){
				throw '[USHUR] Error: Could not create JSON request body.';
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			JSONRequest = null;
		}
		return JSONRequest;
	},
	
	getUeTags: function(campaignID, campaignSysID){
		try{
			var ueTag;
			var description;
			var tokenID= this.getLocalTokenID();
			if(tokenID!= "failure"){
				var appointmentQueryURL= this.appointmentQueryURL;
				var JSONContent= this.getJSONRequest([['tokenId',tokenID],['cmd','getUeTagList'], ['campaignId',campaignID], ['apiVer','2.1']]);
				var response= this.callUshur('post',appointmentQueryURL,JSONContent);
				var httpStatus = response[0];
				if (httpStatus == 200){
					var ushurResponse = response[1];
					
					if(ushurResponse && ushurResponse != "failure" && ushurResponse.status != "failure"){
						
						for(var index=0; index<ushurResponse.result.length; index++){
							var gr= new GlideRecord(gs.getCurrentScopeName()+ '_ue_tag');
							ueTag= ushurResponse.result[index].UeTag;
							description= ushurResponse.result[index].message;
							gs.info("Uetag is: "+ ueTag + " and campaign Sys Id: "+ campaignSysID);
							
							gr.addQuery("campaign_id",campaignSysID);
							gr.addQuery("ue_tag",ueTag);
							gr.query();
							if(!gr.next()){
								gr.initialize();
								gr.campaign_id= campaignSysID;
								gr.ue_tag=ueTag;
								gr.description=description;
								gr.insert();
							}
						}
						
					}
					else{
						throw "[Ushur] Error: Error in Ushur Response....";
					}
				}
				else{
					throw "[Ushur] Error: Some error happened";
				}
			}
			else{
				throw "[Ushur] Error: Token ID failure....";
			}
			
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			return "failure";
		}
	},
	
	triggerCampaign : function(id,userPhoneNumber,userMessage,campaignName,otherAttributes){
		//DESCRIPTION - This function will connect with Ushur and trigger a campaign
		
		/*PARAMETERS-
		id(string): Primary Key ID of the related record while communicating with Ushur
		userPhoneNumber(string): Phone number to which the message will be sent
		userMessage(string): The message sent to the end user as part of the notification
		campaignName(string): The name of the campaign to be created
		otherAtributes(string): Additional attributes to be sent to Ushur. This is a comma separated list of name:value pairs.
 		*/
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		status(boolean): TRUE id campaign was triggered successfully. Returns FALSE if unsuccessful in triggering campaign
 		*/
		var status = false;
		//Get the prerequisites - Endpoint, Token ID, Additional attributes and JSON Request content
		var tokenID = this.getLocalTokenID(); //Get the tokenID
		var initSessionEndpoint = this.initSessURL;
		var jsonRequestAttributes = [['apiVer','2.1'],['cmd','initCampaign'],['callBackNumber',this.callBackNum],['tokenId',tokenID],['userPhoneNo',userPhoneNumber],['userMsg',userMessage],['requestId',id],['campaignId',campaignName],['snowAppId',gs.getCurrentScopeName()]];
		if(!gs.nil(otherAttributes)){
			//Parse other attributes and fill in to JSON request attributes
			otherAttributes = otherAttributes.toString().split(',');
			for(var index = 0; index<otherAttributes.length; index++){
				jsonRequestAttributes.push([otherAttributes[index].slice(0,otherAttributes[index].indexOf(':')),otherAttributes[index].slice(otherAttributes[index].indexOf(':')+1)]);
			}
		}
		var JSONContent = this.getJSONRequest(jsonRequestAttributes);
		try{
			if((tokenID)&&(JSONContent)){
				//Trigger the campaign
				var response = this.callUshur('post',initSessionEndpoint,JSONContent);
				
				//In case of failure modify status to false
				if(!gs.nil(response[1]) 
				   && (response[1] == "failure" || response[1].status == 'failure')){
					//This will happen if http status recieved was not 200, or there was some issue while parsing the response from Ushur
					throw('[USHUR] ERROR: Failure to trigger campaign ' + campaignName + ' for request ID ' + id);
				}
				else{
					status = true;
				}
			}
			else{
				throw('[USHUR] ERROR: Missing pre-requisites(Token id and JSON request body) for the campaign ' + campaignName + ' for request ID ' + id);
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
		}
		return status;
	},
	
	getTargetRecordCondition: function(ueAction,recordID, recipientPhone, SID){
		//This function will create the condition to select target records in the target table
		var condition = '';
		try{
			if(ueAction.create_new){
				var newRec = new GlideRecord(ueAction.target_table);
				newRec.initialize();
				if(newRec.insert()){
					condition = 'sys_id=' + newRec.sys_id;
					if(ueAction.save_ref_in_variable){
						this.createVariableUEMap(ueAction.var_name.toString(), ueAction.ue_tag.campaign_id, SID, newRec.sys_id);
					}
				}
				else{
					throw 'Could not create new record in table ' + ueAction.target_table;
				}
			}
			else{
				if(!gs.nil(ueAction.now_tag) && !gs.nil(recordID)){
					condition = condition + ueAction.now_tag + "=" + recordID + "^";
				}
				if(!gs.nil(ueAction.recipient) && !gs.nil(recipientPhone)){
					condition = condition + ueAction.recipient + ".phone=" + recipientPhone + "^OR" + ueAction.recipient + ".mobile_phone=" + recipientPhone + "^";
				}
				if(!gs.nil(ueAction.target_records)){
					condition = condition + ueAction.target_records + "^";
				}
				condition = condition.slice(0,-1); //Remove the last ^ from the condition string
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error('[USHUR] ERROR: Failed to create condition to select target records for ue Action ' + ueAction.sys_id + '. ' + err);
			condition = false;
		}
		return condition;
	},
	fillFromTemplate: function(target, templateName){
		//Get the template record
		try{
			var template = new GlideRecord(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '_additional_template');
			template.addQuery('table=' + target.getRecordClassName());
			template.addQuery('name=' + templateName);
			template.query();
			if(template.next()){
				var mapping = new GlideRecord(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '_template_value');
				mapping.addQuery('template', template.sys_id);
				mapping.query();
				while(mapping.next()){
					target.setValue(mapping.target_field,mapping.value);
				}
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
		}
	},
	setActionAttributes: function(action, attributes){
		for(var row = 0 ; row < attributes.length ; row++){
			//There is no need for another for loop, as we know each row has 2 items
			if((gs.nil(attributes[row][0])) || (gs.nil(attributes[row][1]))){
				gs.error('[USHUR]ERROR: Error during creation of queue action. Attributes undefined at index ' + row );
			}
			else{
				action.setValue(attributes[row][0].toString(),attributes[row][1].toString());
			}
		}
	},
	createActionFromArray: function(attributes,templateName){
		var actionID;
		var action = new GlideRecord(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '_action_queue');
		action.initialize();
		action.id = Math.floor((Math.random() * 10000000000)).toString(); //Set ID to a random 10 digit number
		this.setActionAttributes(action, attributes);
		if(!gs.nil(templateName)){
			this.fillFromTemplate(action, templateName);
		}
		actionID = this.addToList(action);
		
		if(!actionID){
			gs.error('[USHUR] ERROR: Could not add new record to the end of the linked list ' + action.getTableName());
		}
	},
	createActionFromNode: function(node,attributes,templateName ){
		//This function is used to create records in the action queue
		var actionID;
		try{
			if(gs.nil(node)){
				throw 'No node defined';
			}
			var action = new GlideRecord(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '_action_queue');
			action.initialize();
			action.id = Math.floor((Math.random() * 10000000000)).toString(); //Set ID to a rndom 10 digit number
			action.campaign_id = node.campaign_id;
			action.now_tag = node.now_tag;
			action.user_phone_number = node.user_phone_number;
			action.ue_response = '';
			action.next_record = '';
			action.previous_record = '';
			this.setActionAttributes(action, attributes);
			if(!gs.nil(templateName)){
				this.fillFromTemplate(action, templateName);
			}
			if(node.getRecordClassName() == gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '_action_queue'){
				actionID = this.addToList(action, node);
			}
			else{
				actionID = this.addToList(action);
			}
			
			if(!actionID){
				gs.error('[USHUR] ERROR: Could not add new record to the end of the linked list ' + action.getTableName());
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error('[USHUR] ERROR: Failed to create record in the action queue. ' + err);
			actionID = false;
		}
		return actionID;
	},
	createVariable: function(variableName, description, campaignID){
		var variable;
		try{
			var variableRec = new GlideRecord(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '_workflow_variables');
			variableRec.initialize();
			variableRec.workflow_definition = campaignID;
			variableRec.name = variableName;
			variableRec.description = description;
			variable = variableRec.insert();
			if(gs.nil(variable)){
				throw 'Could not insert new variable ' + variableName;
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error('[USHUR] ERROR: ' + err);
			variable = null;
		}
		return variable;
	},
	getVariableDefinition: function(variableName, campaignID){
		var variable;
		try{
			var variableRec = new GlideRecord(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '_workflow_variables');
			variableRec.addQuery('workflow_definition=' + campaignID);
			variableRec.addQuery('name=' + variableName);
			variableRec.query();
			if(variableRec.next()){
				variable = variableRec.sys_id;
			}
			else{
				throw 'Could not find the variable ' + variableName;
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error('[USHUR] ERROR: ' + err);
			variable = null;
		}
		return variable;
	},
	createVariableUEMap: function(variableName, campaignID, SID, value){
		var map;
		try{
			var variable = this.getVariableDefinition(variableName, campaignID);
			if(!gs.nil(variable)){
				var mapRec = new GlideRecord(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '_variable_ue_map');
				mapRec.initialize();
				mapRec.variable = variable;
				mapRec.ue_sid = SID;
				mapRec.value = value;
				map = mapRec.insert();
				if(gs.nil(map)){
					throw 'Could not insert new "variable uE mapping" for the variable ' + variableName;
				}
			}
			else{
				throw 'Could not insert new "variable uE mapping" for the variable ' + variableName;
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error('[USHUR] ERROR: ' + err);
			map = null;
		}
		return map;
	},
	getVariableUEMap: function(variableName, campaignID, SID){
		var map;
		try{
			var variable = this.getVariableDefinition(variableName, campaignID);
			if(!gs.nil(variable)){
				var mapRec = new GlideRecord(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '_variable_ue_map');
				mapRec.addQuery('variable=' + variable);
				mapRec.addQuery('ue_sid=' + SID);
				mapRec.query();
				if(mapRec.next()){
					map = mapRec;
				}
				else{
					throw 'Could not find "variable uE mapping" for the variable ' + variableName;
				}
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error('[USHUR] ERROR: ' + err);
			map = null;
		}
		return map;
	},
	setVariableValue: function(variableName, campaignID, SID, value){
		var sysID;
		try{
			var map = this.getVariableUEMap(variableName, campaignID, SID);
			if(gs.nil(map)){
				sysID = this.createVariableUEMap(variableName, campaignID, SID, value);
			}
			else{
				map.value = value;
				sysID = map.update();
				if(gs.nil(sysID)){
					throw 'Could not update "variable uE mapping" for the variable ' + variableName;
				}
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error('[USHUR] ERROR: ' + err);
			sysID = false;
		}
		return sysID;
	},
	getVariableValue: function(variableName, campaignID, SID){
		var value;
		try{
			var map = this.getVariableUEMap(variableName, campaignID, SID);
			if(!gs.nil(map)){
				value = map.value;
			}
			else{
				throw 'Could not get the value of the variable ' + variableName;
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error('[USHUR] ERROR: ' + err);
			value = null;
		}
		return value;
	},
	getUserResponse: function(action){
		var userResponse = null;
		var tokenID = this.getLocalTokenID(); //Get the tokenID
		try{
			var JSONContent;
			if(action.triggered_by == 'servicenow'){
				JSONContent = this.getJSONRequest([['userPhoneNo',action.user_phone_number],['tokenId',tokenID],['requestId',action.now_tag],['sid',action.sid],['filterCmd','LastFirst'],['UeTag',action.ue_tag.ue_tag],['apiVer','2.1']]);
			}
			if((action.triggered_by == 'user')){
				if(!gs.nil(action.ue_tag.last_record_id)){
					JSONContent = this.getJSONRequest([['tokenId',tokenID],['filterCmd','getSids'],['UeTag',action.ue_tag.ue_tag],['campaignId',action.campaign_id.campaign_id],['lastRecordId',action.ue_tag.last_record_id.toString()],['nRecords',this.nRecords],['apiVer','2.1']]);
				}
				else{
					JSONContent = this.getJSONRequest([['tokenId',tokenID],['filterCmd','getSids'],['UeTag',action.ue_tag.ue_tag],['campaignId',action.campaign_id.campaign_id],['nRecords',this.nRecords],['apiVer','2.1']]);
				}
			}
			if((tokenID)&&(JSONContent)){
				var campaignResponseEndPoint = this.appointmentQueryURL;
				var response = this.callUshur('post',campaignResponseEndPoint,JSONContent);
				
				//Read the response
				var ushurResponse = response[1];
				if((action.triggered_by == 'user') && (!gs.nil(ushurResponse.lastRecordId))){
					var ueTag = new GlideRecord(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '_ue_tag');
					if(ueTag.get(action.ue_tag)){
						ueTag.setValue('last_record_id',ushurResponse.lastRecordId);
						ueTag.update();
					}
				}
				if (!gs.nil(ushurResponse) && ushurResponse != "failure"){
					//Loop through the results
					for(var index = 0; index < ushurResponse.result.length; index++){
						//Skip the objects that contain the topic. These objects are the messages sent to the user.
						if(!ushurResponse.result[index].response.topic){
							if(action.triggered_by == 'user'){
								this.createActionFromArray([['campaign_id',action.campaign_id],['now_tag',ushurResponse.result[index].requestId],['user_phone_number',ushurResponse.result[index].phone],['sid',ushurResponse.result[index].sid],['triggered_by','servicenow'],['ue_action',action.ue_action],['ue_tag',action.ue_tag], ['ue_response',ushurResponse.result[index].response.dispStr],['type','run_script']],'Create action from uE to now mapping');
							}
							if(action.triggered_by == 'servicenow'){
								userResponse = ushurResponse.result[index].response.dispStr;
							}
						}
					}
				}
				else{
					throw '[USHUR] ERROR: Failure to connect with Ushur. Could not determine the user\'s response';
				}
			}
			else{
				throw '[USHUR] ERROR: Missing pre-requisites(Token id ,JSON request body) for the campaign ' + action.ue_tag.campaign_id.campaign_id;
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			userResponse = false;
		}
		return userResponse;
	},
	runActionScript: function(action,variables){
		var answer;
		try{
			if(!gs.nil(action.script)){
				//Run the script
				var evaluator = new GlideScopedEvaluator();
				evaluator.putVariable('current',action);
				if(!gs.nil(variables)){
					for(var index=0; index<variables.length; index++){
						evaluator.putVariable(variables[index][0],variables[index][1]);
					}
				}
				answer = evaluator.evaluateScript(action,'script');
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error('[USHUR] ERROR: Could not evaluate script in the action ' + action.id + '. ' + err);
			answer = null;
		}
		return answer;
	},
	performAction: function(action){
		var status = true;
		
		try{
			if(action.type == 'run_script'){
				var resultOfScript = this.runActionScript(action);
			}
			else{
				var value;
				value = action.ue_response;
				
				if(!gs.nil(action.source_variable)){
					value = this.getVariableValue(action.source_variable.toString(), action.campaign_id, action.sid);
				}
				
				if(!gs.nil(action.target_table)){
					//Get the target records
					var target = new GlideRecord(action.target_table);
					target.addQuery(action.target_records);
					target.query();
					while(target.next()){
						if(!gs.nil(action.script)){
							var workflowVariables = {};
							var variableMap = new GlideRecord(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '_variable_ue_map');
							variableMap.addQuery('ue_sid=' + action.sid);
							variableMap.query();
							while(variableMap.next()){
								workflowVariables[variableMap.variable.name.toString()] = variableMap.value.toString();
							}
							
							//Run the script
							var variables = [];
							variables.push(['target',target]);
							if(!gs.nil(action.ue_response)){
								variables.push(['response',action.ue_response]);
							}
							if(!gs.nil(action.now_tag)){
								variables.push(['requestId',action.now_tag]);
							}
							if(!gs.nil(action.user_phone_number)){
								variables.push(['phone',action.user_phone_number]);
							}
							if(!gs.nil(action.sid)){
								variables.push(['variables',workflowVariables]);
							}
							value = this.runActionScript(action,variables);
						}
						
						if((gs.nil(action.target_variable)) && (!gs.nil(action.target_field)) && (!gs.nil(value))){
							//Need to use GlideEvaluator so that journal fields can be updated
							var evaluator = new GlideScopedEvaluator();
							evaluator.putVariable('target',target);
							
							//Create a dummy gliderecord to execute the script
							var script = new GlideRecord('sys_script');
							script.initialize();
							script.script = 'target.' + action.target_field.toString() + ' = "' + value + '";';
							evaluator.evaluateScript(script,'script'); //Evaluate the script to fill the target record
							if(target.update()){
								status = true;
							}
							else{
								throw 'Could not update target';
							}
						}
						
					}
				}
				
				if((!gs.nil(action.target_variable)) && (!gs.nil(value))){
					if(gs.nil(this.setVariableValue(action.target_variable, action.campaign_id, action.sid, value))){
						throw 'Failed to store the value in the target variable';
					}
				}
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			status = false;
		}
		return status;
	},
	saveUserResponse: function(id, userPhoneNumber, campaignName, excludedTags){
		//DESCRIPTION - This function will connect with Ushur to get the response provided by end users to campaigns triggered from ServiceNow
		
		/*PARAMETERS-
		id(string): Primary Key ID of the related record while communicating with Ushur
		userPhoneNumber(string): Phone number to which the message will be sent
		campaignName(string): The name of the campaign
		excludedTags(array): An array of tags that should be excluded in this call
 		*/
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		campaignCompletionStatus(string / boolean): -1 if no response recieved from user, 0 if partial response recieved and 1 if all response recieved. False in case of failure
 		*/
		
		var completedTags = [];
		
		/****Get the pre-requisites: Token ID, JSON request content, UE tags******/
		var tokenID = this.getLocalTokenID(); //Get the tokenID
		
		//Populate the global variables allUETagObject and UETag with all UE tags related to this campaign, by reading the UE tag table.
		//Define the variables
		var allUETagNames = ''; //Comma separated string of UE Tags
		
		var excludedTagsQuery = '';  //Query to exclude the completed UE tags
		for(var counter=0; counter < excludedTags.length; counter++){
			excludedTagsQuery = excludedTagsQuery + 'ue_tag!=' + excludedTags[counter] + '^';
		}
		excludedTagsQuery = excludedTagsQuery.slice(0,-1); //Remove the final ^OR
		
		var UETag = new GlideRecord(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '_ue_action');
		UETag.addQuery('campaign_id.campaign_id',campaignName);
		UETag.addQuery(excludedTagsQuery);
		UETag.query();
		while(UETag.next()){
			allUETagNames = allUETagNames + UETag.ue_tag + ",";
		}
		
		try{
			if(allUETagNames.length > 0){
				allUETagNames = allUETagNames.slice(0,-1); //Remove the last comma
				var JSONContent = this.getJSONRequest([['cmd','responseForReqId'],['userPhoneNo',userPhoneNumber],['tokenId',tokenID],['requestId',id],['filterCmd','LastEngagement'],['UeTag',allUETagNames],['apiVer','2.1']]);
				
				if((tokenID)&&(JSONContent)){
					var campaignComplete = false;
					var campaignResponseEndPoint = this.appointmentQueryURL;
					var response = this.callUshur('post',campaignResponseEndPoint,JSONContent);
					
					//Read the response
					var ushurResponse = response[1];
					if (!gs.nil(ushurResponse) && ushurResponse!= "failure"){
						//Loop through the results
						for(var index = 0; index < ushurResponse.result.length; index++){
							//Skip the objects that contain the topic. These objects are the messages sent to the user.
							if(!ushurResponse.result[index].response.topic){
								if(this.performAction(id,userPhoneNumber,ushurResponse.result[index].response)){
									
									completedTags.push(ushurResponse.result[index].response.UeTag.toString());
								}
							}
						}
					}
					else{
						throw '[USHUR] ERROR: Failure to connect with Ushur. Could not determine the user\'s response';
					}
				}
				else{
					throw '[USHUR] ERROR: Missing pre-requisites(Token id ,JSON request body) for the campaign ' + campaignName + ' for request ID ' + id;
				}
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			completedTags = false;
		}
		return completedTags;
	},
	performAction_old: function(id,userPhoneNumber, response){
		//DESCRIPTION - This function will perform actions against user responses to campaign questions
		
		/*PARAMETERS-
		id(string): Primary Key ID of the related record while communicating with Ushur
		userPhoneNumber(string): Phone number to which the message will be sent
		response(object): This object contains the details of the user's response
 		*/
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		status(boolean): True if all the performed successfully, false otherwise
 		*/
		
		var status = true; //Assume success
		var failedActions = []; //Sys ID of actions that failed during execution
		var action = new GlideRecord(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '_ue_action');
		action.addQuery('ue_tag=' + response.UeTag.toString());
		action.addQuery('active=true');
		action.orderBy('order');
		action.query();
		try{
			//Get the GlideRecord object of the target
			var target;
			var targetTable = '';
			
			var targetRecordsQuery = '';
			while(action.next()){
				targetTable = action.getValue('target_table');
				target = new GlideRecord(targetTable);
				if(action.getValue('create_new').toString() == 'true'){
					//Create new record
					target.initialize();
					this.fillTargetRecord(target,action,response);
					//Insert the target
					if(!target.insert()){
						failedActions.push(action.sys_id);
					}
				}
				else{
					//Generate the query to select records in the target table
					targetRecordsQuery = action.getValue('target_records');
					if((targetRecordsQuery)&&(targetRecordsQuery.indexOf('[Triggering Record ID]')>=0)){
						//[Triggering record ID] must be replaced with the id of the record that triggered the campaign
						targetRecordsQuery = targetRecordsQuery.replace('[Triggering Record ID]',id);
						
						while(targetRecordsQuery.indexOf('[Requester phone number]') >= 0){
							//While loop is needed to replace all occurrences
							targetRecordsQuery = targetRecordsQuery.replace('[Requester phone number]',userPhoneNumber);
						}
					}
					//Add the query to the target gliderecord
					target.addQuery(targetRecordsQuery);
					target.query();  //Finally the target GlideRecord is ready!
					while(target.next()){
						this.fillTargetRecord(target,action,response);
						//UPdate the target
						if(!target.update()){
							failedActions.push(action.sys_id);
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if(failedActions.length>0){
				throw '[USHUR] ERROR: Could not complete all actions. Failed to execute actions having sys_id: ' + failedActions.toString();
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			status = false;
		}
		return status;
	},
	fillTargetRecord: function(target, action, response){
		//DESCRIPTION - This function will fill the target record with values defined in the action being executed
		
		/*PARAMETERS-
		target(GlideRecord): The target record
		action(GlideRecord): The current action being performed
 		*/
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		status(boolean):TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise
 		*/
		
		var mappedField = '';
		var mappedFieldValue = '';
		//Map the user's response
		mappedField = action.getValue('target_field');
		if(mappedField){
			mappedFieldValue = response.dispStr;
			if(action.getValue('prefix')){
				mappedFieldValue = action.getValue('prefix').toString() + targetFieldValue;
			}
			if(action.getValue('suffix')){
				mappedFieldValue = targetFieldValue + action.getValue('suffix').toString();
			}
			target.setValue(mappedField,mappedFieldValue);
		}
		
		//Set the values in the target record as per the 'Set field value' field
		var name = '';
		var value = '';
		if(action.getValue('field_value_template')){
			
			var fieldTemplate = action.getValue('field_value_template').replace(/ /g, "").split(",");
			
			for(var index=0; index < fieldTemplate.length; index++){
				if(fieldTemplate[index].indexOf('=') >= 0){
					name = fieldTemplate[index].slice(0,fieldTemplate[index].indexOf('='));
					value = fieldTemplate[index].slice(fieldTemplate[index].indexOf('=') + 1);
					target.setValue(name,value);
				}
			}
		}
		
		if(action.getValue('script')){
			//Run the script
			var evaluator = new GlideScopedEvaluator();
			evaluator.putVariable('target',target);
			evaluator.evaluateScript(action,'script');
		}
	},
	addToList: function(record,addAfterThis){
		//DESCRIPTION - This function will add a new record to the end of the linked list (represented by tables like 'Live Ushur')
		
		/*PARAMETERS-
		record(GlideRecord): The record to be inserted into the linked list
		addAfterthis(GlideRecord): The record after which the new record will be inserted. If this is null the record will be inserted in the end
 		*/
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		sys_id(string / boolean): Sys ID of the record if successfully added to the list, FALSE otherwise
 		*/
		
		var sys_id = '';
		try{
			if(gs.nil(addAfterThis)){
				//Find the last record in the queue
				var lastRecord = new GlideRecord(record.getRecordClassName());
				lastRecord.addEncodedQuery('next_recordISEMPTY^previous_recordISNOTEMPTY'); //Last record is identified by this query
				lastRecord.query();
				if(lastRecord.next()){
					addAfterThis = lastRecord;
				}
				else{
					throw '[USHUR] Error: Could not determine the end of queue in the table ' + record.getTableName();
				}
			}
			if(addAfterThis.getRecordClassName() == record.getRecordClassName()){
				record.setValue('next_record',addAfterThis.next_record.toString());  //The Next pointer of new record should be same as the previous record
				record.setValue('previous_record',addAfterThis.sys_id.toString());  //Set the Previous pointer of the new record
				if(record.isNewRecord()){
					sys_id = record.insert();
				}
				else{
					sys_id = record.update();
				}
				
				addAfterThis.setValue('next_record',record.sys_id.toString());  //Reset the Next pointer of the previous Record
				if((!sys_id)||(!addAfterThis.update())){
					throw '[USHUR] Error: Failed to update the node ' + addAfterThis.sys_id.toString();
				}
				
				if(!gs.nil(addAfterThis)){
					//Reset the previous pointer of the next record
					var nextNode = new GlideRecord(record.getRecordClassName());
					if(nextNode.get(record.next_record.toString())){
						nextNode.setValue('previous_record',sys_id);
						if(!nextNode.update()){
							throw '[USHUR] Error: Failed to update the node ' + nextNode.sys_id.toString();
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else{
				throw '[USHUR] ERROR: The records ' + record.sys_id + ' and ' + addAfterThis.sys_id + ' belong to classes ' + record.getRecordClassName() + ' and ' + addAfterThis.getRecordClassName() + ' respectively.';
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			//If the record has already been inserted at this point, delete it
			if((!record.isNewRecord())&&(!record.deleteRecord())){
				gs.error('[USHUR] Error: Queue in the table ' + record.getTableName() + ' contains isolated record(s). Please contact administrator.');
			}
			sys_id = false;
		}
		return sys_id;
	},
	removeFromList: function(recordToBeRemoved){
		//DESCRIPTION - This function will remove an existing record from the linked list (represented by tables like 'Live Ushur')
		
		/*PARAMETERS-
		recordToBeRemoved(GlideRecord): The record to be removed from the linked list
 		*/
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		status(boolean): TRUE if successfully removed from the list, FALSE otherwise
 		*/
		
		var status = true;
		var previousRecord = new GlideRecord(recordToBeRemoved.getRecordClassName());
		var nextRecord = new GlideRecord(recordToBeRemoved.getRecordClassName());
		try{
			if((recordToBeRemoved.previous_record) && (recordToBeRemoved.previous_record != '') && (previousRecord.get(recordToBeRemoved.previous_record))){
				previousRecord.setValue('next_record',recordToBeRemoved.next_record);
				if(!previousRecord.update()){
					throw 'Could not update the previous record linked with the record ' + recordToBeRemoved.id;
				}
				else{
					if((recordToBeRemoved.next_record) && (recordToBeRemoved.next_record != '') &&(!nextRecord.get(recordToBeRemoved.next_record))){
						throw 'Could not get the next record linked with the record ' + recordToBeRemoved.id;
					}
					else{
						if((recordToBeRemoved.next_record) && (recordToBeRemoved.next_record != '')){
							nextRecord.setValue('previous_record',recordToBeRemoved.previous_record);
							if(!nextRecord.update()){
								throw 'Could not update the next record linked with the record ' + recordToBeRemoved.id;
							}
						}
						if(!recordToBeRemoved.deleteRecord()){
							throw 'Could not execute the method deleteRecord()';
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else{
				throw 'Could not get the previous record linked with the record ' + recordToBeRemoved.id;
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error('[USHUR] Error: Failed to delete the record ' + recordToBeRemoved.id + '.MESSAGE: ' + err);
			//If any record was updated at this point, revert back the changes
			if((previousRecord.get(recordToBeRemoved.previous_record))&&(previousRecord.next_record == recordToBeRemoved.next_record)){
				previousRecord.setValue('next_record',recordToBeRemoved.sys_id);
				if(!previousRecord.update()){
					gs.error('[USHUR] Error: Queue in the table ' + recordToBeRemoved.getTableName() + ' contains duplicate values in \'Next Record\' field. Please contact administrator.');
				}
			}
			if((nextRecord.get(recordToBeRemoved.next_record))&&(nextRecord.previous_record == recordToBeRemoved.previous_record)){
				nextRecord.setValue('previous_record',recordToBeRemoved.sys_id);
				if(!nextRecord.update()){
					gs.error('[USHUR] Error: Queue in the table ' + recordToBeRemoved.getTableName() + ' contains duplicate values in \'Previous Record\' field. Please contact administrator.');
				}
			}
			status = false;
		}
		return status;
	},
	getNextRecordInList: function(table, currentRecord){
		//DESCRIPTION - This function will record the sys_id of the next record in the linked list (represented by tables like 'Live Ushur')
		
		/*PARAMETERS-
		table(String): Name of the linked list table
		currentRecord(String): The Sys ID of the current record.
 		*/
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		nextRecord(String / Boolean): Sys ID of the record next to the current record in the linked list. FALSE in case of failure.
 		*/
		
		var nextRecord = '';
		var liveUshur = new GlideRecord(table);
		try{
			if((!liveUshur.get(currentRecord)) || (!liveUshur.next_record) || (liveUshur.next_record == '')){
				nextRecord = this.getHeaderOfList(table);
				if(!nextRecord){
					throw 'Could not find the header in the table ' + table;
				}
			}
			else{
				nextRecord = liveUshur.next_record;
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error('[USHUR] ERROR: Could not determine the record next to the record with sys_id ' + currentRecord + ' in table ' + table + '. MESSAGE: ' + err);
			nextRecord = false;
		}
		return nextRecord;
	},
	getHeaderOfList: function(table){
		//DESCRIPTION - This function will record the sys_id of the header in the linked list (represented by tables like 'Live Ushur')
		
		/*PARAMETERS-
		table(String): Name of the linked list table
 		*/
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		header(String / false): Sys ID of the header in the linked list. FALSE in case of failure.
 		*/
		
		var header = '';
		var liveUshur = new GlideRecord(table);
		liveUshur.addQuery('queue_header',true);
		liveUshur.query();
		try{
			while(liveUshur.next()){
				if(liveUshur.getRecordClassName() == table){
					header = liveUshur.sys_id;
				}
			}
			if(header == ''){
				throw '[USHUR] ERROR: Could not find the header in the table ' + table;
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error(err);
			header = false;
		}
		return header;
	},
	createGlobalRecord: function(table, values){
		//DESCRIPTION - This function will create a record in a table where 'can create' is set to false for other application scope. It will use the SOAP web service. This is specially beneficial for Global tables.
		
		/*PARAMETERS-
		table(String): Name of the table in which new record will be inserted
		values(2D array): Name-value pair of the field values for the new record
 		*/
		
		/*RETURN VALUE-
		sys_id(String / false): Sys ID of the new record. FALSE in case of failure.
 		*/
		
		var sys_id;
		var requestBody = '<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv=\"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/\" xmlns:sys=\"http://www.service-now.com/' + table +'\"><soapenv:Header/><soapenv:Body><sys:insert>'; //Add the SOAP request metadata
		//Adding the field values in the requestBody
		for(var index=0; index<values.length; index++){
			requestBody = requestBody + "<" + values[index][0] + ">" + values[index][1] + "</" + values[index][0] + ">";
		}
		//Finish the request body by adding the closing tags for the metadata
		requestBody = requestBody + '</sys:insert></soapenv:Body></soapenv:Envelope>';
		//Send the SOAP request
		try{
			var soapRequest = new sn_ws.SOAPMessageV2();
			soapRequest.setEndpoint(gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + table + '.do?SOAP'); //set the web service provider endpoint
			soapRequest.setSOAPAction('http://www.service-now.com/' + table + '/insert'); //set the SOAP action to perform
			soapRequest.setBasicAuth(gs.getProperty('x_ushur_critincmgt.connect.self.user_id'),gs.getProperty('x_ushur_critincmgt.connect.self.password'));
			soapRequest.setRequestBody(requestBody);
			
			var response = soapRequest.execute();
			if(response.haveError()){
				throw response.getErrorMessage();
			}
			else{
				var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();   //Get the status
				var responseBody = response.getBody();
				if(httpStatus == 200){
					//Parse the XML output to get the sys_id of the new record
					var output = new XMLDocument2();
					output.parseXML(responseBody);
					
					sys_id = output.getNodeText("//sys_id");
					
				}
				else{
					throw "HTTP Status is " + httpStatus +". Expected status to be 200.";
				}
			}
			
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error("[USHUR] Error: Unable to create new record in the table" + table + ". Description: " + err);
			sys_id = false;
		}
		return sys_id;
	},
	performBlacklistActions: function(command){
		var success = true;
		try{
			var tokenID = this.getLocalTokenID(); //Get the tokenID
			if(tokenID != 'failure'){
				var JSONContent;
				var campaignResponseEndPoint = this.appointmentQueryURL;
				JSONContent = this.getJSONRequest([['tokenId',tokenID],['cmd',command],['params','metaData'],['meta-field','phone'],['apiVer','2.1']]);
				
				var response = this.callUshur('post',campaignResponseEndPoint,JSONContent);
				//var response = this.callUshur("Get Blacklisted phone numbers ", campaignResponseEndPoint,['JSON',JSONContent]);
				//Read the response
				var httpStatus=response[0];
				if (httpStatus == 200){
					var ushurResponse = response[1];
					var queryArray = [];
					if(!gs.nil(ushurResponse) && ushurResponse!= "failure"){
						for(var index = 0; index < ushurResponse.users.length; index++){
							for(var count=0; count < ushurResponse.users[index].data.length; count++){
								var data = ushurResponse.users[index].data[count];

								var blacklistAction = new GlideRecord(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '_blacklist_action');
								blacklistAction.addQuery('active',true);
								if(command=='getBlackListed'){
									blacklistAction.addQuery('type','blacklist');
								}
								else if(command=='getBlackToWhiteListed'){
									blacklistAction.addQuery('type','blacklist_to_whitelist');
								}
								blacklistAction.query();
								while(blacklistAction.next()){
									if(!gs.nil(data[blacklistAction.identifier])){
										var target = new GlideRecord(blacklistAction.target_table);
										target.addQuery(blacklistAction.matching_field,data[blacklistAction.identifier]);
										target.query();
										while(target.next()){
											var setValues = new GlideRecord(gs.getCurrentScopeName() + '_blacklist_action_values');
											setValues.addQuery('blacklist_action', blacklistAction.sys_id);
											setValues.addQuery('target_table', blacklistAction.target_table);
											setValues.query();

											this.setTargetValue(setValues.value,target,setValues.target_field);
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				else {
					throw 'Status code: ' + httpStatus;
				}
			}
			else {
				throw 'Token ID not found.';
			}
		}
		catch(err){
			gs.error('USHUR[ERROR]: Could not perform all blacklist actions. Reason: ' + err);
			success = false;
		}
		return success;
	},
	setTargetValue: function(sourceValue,target,targetField){
		if(!gs.nil(sourceValue)){
			//Need to use GlideEvaluator so that journal fields can be updated
			var evaluator = new GlideScopedEvaluator();
			evaluator.putVariable('target',target);
			
			//Create a dummy gliderecord to execute the script
			var script = new GlideRecord('sys_script');
			script.initialize();
			script.script = 'target.' + targetField + ' = "' + sourceValue + '";';
			evaluator.evaluateScript(script,'script'); //Evaluate the script to fill the target record
		}
	},
	type: 'UshurUtil'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>dev.snow1@ushur.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-08-21 13:35:23</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>c5dbdeba0f5d6a00981bc3ace1050e0e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UshurUtilSample</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_c5dbdeba0f5d6a00981bc3ace1050e0e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kamini</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-09-13 18:36:27</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
